name: World32 alpha1.2
description:
World32 is nearly an open-world game... but the world has only a size of 10,000 tiles. Discover the landscapes and build your own world... build your World32!

The game is for free. Press only "No thanks, just take me to the downloads" above the "2.00$" line. But you can donate to advance the work :)

Changes:

-less trees and bushes grow up
-can destroy desert:hill
-added meteorite
-added gold, iron, copper, aluminium
-added inventory tabs to craft easier
-first inventory place is automatically choosed
-move through the inventory with A and D
-free the mouse with F1 and grab them with F2
-create and load as many worlds as you want
-added main menu
-choose languages german and english
-added rail and trainsystem

Control:

WASD - Walk

LEFT,RIGHT,UP,DOWN - set chooser to dismantle

SPACE(PRESS) + LEFT,RIGHT,UP,DOWN - dismantle

E - inventory / left inventory

A,D (in inventory) - choose an item and than press

B - to take this and than press E to left inventory, than

SPACE - to build the item

UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT (in inventory) - scroll through crafting menu and than press

SPACE - to craft

R - Save

UP,DOWN (in main menu) - scroll through menu

ENTER (in main menu) - continue

SPACE (in choose menu) - continue

Items to craft:

Axe: to destroy wood

Pickaxe: to destroy stone

Boat: to swim

Stone Ground: for ground

Big Pyramid: deco

Wood Block: for walls or other

Bucket: to craft bricks

Stone Tower: to get the world domination

Ship: to swim cooler

Brick: to build brick walls

Wedge Stone: to craft tools

Gold,Iron,Copper,Aluminium: decoration

Rail: to travel faster
